description.english: Beat the game in color-swapped clothing!
description.german: Beende das Spiel in farblich ausgewechselter Kleidung!
description.french: Terminez le jeu dans des vêtements à couleurs changées !
description.italian: Vinci il gioco con vestiti cangianti!
description.spanish: ¡Termina el juego con una ropa cambiada de color!
description.japanese: 色違いの衣装でゲームをクリアしよう！

description.english: Defeat 5 or more enemies with a single Obliterate!
description.german: Besiege 5 oder mehr Feinde mit einem einzigen Schlag!
description.french: Battez 5 ennemis ou plus avec un simple anéantissement !
description.italian: Sconfiggi 5 o più nemici con un solo Obliterato!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a 5 o más enemigos con un solo ataque!
description.japanese: 五体以上の敵を一撃で倒そう！

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies as a Blobfish!
description.french: Battez 10 ennemis en tant que Blobfish !
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici come pesce Blob!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a 10 enemigos como un Blobfish!
description.japanese: ニュウドウカジカになって敵を10体倒そう！

description.english: Defeat Risky Boots while in Tinkerbat Form!
description.french: Battez Risky Boots en étant en forme de Tinkerbat !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Risky Boots mentre sei sotto forma di Tinkerbat!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a Risky Boots con la forma de un Tinkerbat!
description.japanese: ティンカーバットの姿でリスキィ・ブーツを倒そう！

displayName.japanese: ガーディアン・ジーニー

description.english: Save Scuttletown!
description.french: Sauvez Scuttletown!
description.italian: Salva Scuttletown!
description.spanish: ¡Salva a Scuttletown!
description.japanese: Scuttletownを保存してください！

description.english: Stop the Techno Baron!
description.french: Arrêtez Techno Baron !
description.italian: Ferma Techno Baron!
description.spanish: ¡Detén al Techno Baron!
description.japanese: テクノ・バロンを止めよう！

displayName.japanese: 忘れたままの方がいい！

description.english: Find the lost memories!
description.french: Trouvez les souvenirs perdus !
description.italian: Trova i ricordi persi!
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra los recuerdos perdidos!
description.japanese: 失われた記憶を見つけよう！

description.english: Finish the race!
description.french: Terminez la course !
description.italian: Finisci la gara!
description.spanish: ¡Acaba la carrera!
description.japanese: レースを完走しよう！

displayName.french: La maison des horreurs d'Hypno Barron
displayName.italian: La Casa degli Orrori di Hypno Baron
displayName.spanish: La Casa de los Horrores de Hypno Baron
displayName.japanese: ヒプノ・バロンの恐怖の館

description.english: Foil the Dual Barons!
description.french: Battez les deux barons !
description.italian: Ostacola i Doppi Baroni!
description.spanish: ¡Para a los Dual Barons!
description.japanese: 二人組みのバロンを食い止めよう！

displayName.french: Le Protecteur du Royaume des génies
displayName.spanish: Defensora del Reino de los Genios
displayName.japanese: ジーニーの領域守護者

description.english: Defeat Risky Boots!
description.french: Battez Risky Boots !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Risky Boots!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a Risky Boots!
description.japanese: リスキィ・ブーツを倒そう！

displayName.japanese: ハーフジーニーは、一人前のヒーロー！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as Shantae!
description.french: Atteindre 100% d'achèvement en tant que Shantae!
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% di completamento come Shantae!
description.spanish: ¡Alcanza el 100% de finalización como Shantae!
description.japanese: Shantaeとして100％達成！

description.english: Obtain all win screens in any Shantae Mode!
description.german: Erhalte alle Gewinn-Bildschirme in jedem Shantae-Modus!
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire dans n'importe quel mode Shantae !
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le schermate di vittoria con qualsiasi Modalità Shantae!
description.spanish: ¡Obtén todas las pantallas de victoria en cualquier modo de Shantae!
description.japanese: シャンティのモードの一つで勝利のスクリーンを全て入手しよう！

description.english: Complete Hard Core Mode!
description.german: Beende den Shantae Hard Core Modus und zeige ihm, was du drauf hast.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Hardcore, et montrez comment ça marche ici.
description.italian: Completa la Modalità a Tutta Forza di Shantae e mostra cosa è.
description.spanish: Completa el Modo Shantae Hard Core, y demuestra lo que vales.
description.japanese: シャンティのハードコアモードをクリアして凄いとこ見せちゃおう。

description.english: Use your Tinkerbats to defeat 15 renegade Tinkerbats!
description.german: Benutze deine Tinkerbats, um 15 abtrünnige Tinkerbats zu besiegen!
description.french: Utilisez vos Tinkerbats pour vaincre 15 Tinkerbats rebelles !
description.italian: Usa le tue Tinkerbats per sconfiggere 15 Tinkerbats fuorilegge!
description.spanish: ¡Usa a tus Tinkerbats para derrotar a 15 Tinkerbats renegados!
description.japanese: ティンカーバットを使って裏切ったティンカーバットを15体倒そう！

description.english: Complete Pirate Queen's Quest with zero upgrades!
description.german: Erledige die Aufgabe der Piratenkönigin mit null Upgrades!
description.french: Terminez la quête de la Reine Pirate sans la moindre amélioration !
description.italian: Completa la Missione di Regina dei Pirati con zero aggiornamenti!
description.spanish: ¡Completa Pirate Queen's Quest con cero mejoras!
description.japanese: 一度もアップグレードをしないで海賊女王のクエストを終わらせよう！

description.english: Remind everyone who's boss!
description.german: Zeige jedem, wer der Boss ist!
description.french: Rappelez à tous qui est le patron !
description.italian: Ricorda a tutti chi è il capo!
description.spanish: ¡Recuerda a todos quién es la jefa!
description.japanese: 誰がボスなのか、思い出させよう！

displayName.english: The one true Queen of the Seven Seas!
displayName.german: Die eine wahre Königin der sieben Meere!
displayName.french: La seule et vraie Reine des Sept Mers !
displayName.italian: L'unica vera Regina dei Sette Mari!
displayName.spanish: ¡La única y verdadera Reina de los 7 Mares!
displayName.japanese: 正真正銘、七つの海の女王！

description.english: Foil the techno upstart!
description.french: Battez l'arriviste techno !
description.italian: Ostacola il nuovo arrivato techno!
description.spanish: ¡Para al techno presumido!
description.japanese: 成り上がりのテクノ野郎を阻止しよう！

displayName.japanese: 去っていき忘れられたもの

description.english: What was that for?
description.french: C'était pour quoi, ça ?
description.italian: Per che cos'era quello?
description.spanish: ¿Para qué era eso?
description.japanese: どういうつもりだ！

description.english: Take out the trash!
description.french: Sortez les ordures !
description.italian: Porta via la spazzatura!
description.spanish: ¡Saca la basura!
description.japanese: クズを排除しろ！

description.english: Give 'em something to think about!
description.french: Faites-leur réfléchir à deux fois !
description.italian: Dagli qualcosa a cui pensare!
description.spanish: ¡Dales algo en lo que pensar!
description.japanese: 何か考えることを与えてやれ！

description.english: Defeat the Half-Genie brat!
description.french: Battez cette mi-génie frappée !
description.italian: Sconfiggi quel marmocchio Mezzo-Genio!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a esa Medio Genio mocosa!
description.japanese: あのハーフジーニーの小娘を倒す！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as Risky Boots!
description.german: Erreiche 100% ige Erfüllung als Riskante Stiefel!
description.french: Atteindre 100% d'achèvement en tant que bottes risquées!
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% di completamento come Risky Boots!
description.spanish: ¡Alcanza el 100% de compleción como Risky Boots!
description.japanese: 危険なブーツとして100％完成！

description.english: Obtain all win screens in Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.german: Erhalte alle Gewinner-Bildschirme von Quest der Piratenkönigin.
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire de la Quête de la reine pirate.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli schermi vincenti del Pirata alla Ricerca della Regina.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria de Pirate Queen´s Quest.
description.japanese: 海賊女王のクエストで勝利のスクリーンを全て入手。

description.english: Raise all three friends to Max Level!
description.german: Levele alle drei Freunde zum Max Level!
description.french: Montez les trois amis au niveau max !
description.italian: Innalza tutte e tre gli amici al Livello Massimo!
description.spanish: ¡Sube a los tres amigos al máximo nivel!
description.japanese: 三人の友達のレベルを最大限まで上げよう！

description.english: Save blah blah blah...
description.french: Pas de blabla…
description.italian: Salva blah blah blah …
description.spanish: Ahórrate la cháchara…
description.japanese: なんたらかんたらを助けよう…

description.english: Free a captivating captive!
description.french: Libérez un captif captivant !
description.italian: Libera un prigioniero accattivante!
description.spanish: ¡Libera a un cautivo cautivador!
description.japanese: 囚われた捕虜を解放しよう！

description.english: Brings back memories...
description.french: Ça rappelle le bon vieux temps…
description.italian: Riporta alla mente i ricordi …
description.spanish: Trae recuerdos perdidos…
description.japanese: 記憶を思い出そう…

description.english: Take down an army.
description.french: Anéantissez une armée.
description.italian: Abbatti un esercito.
description.spanish: Acaba con un ejército.
description.japanese: 部隊を倒そう。

description.english: Clear the residence of evil.
description.french: Une résidence du mal éliminée, une.
description.italian: Liberato una residenza del male.
description.spanish: Limpia una residencia del mal.
description.japanese: 悪の居住を一掃した。

description.english: Save your friend from a sinister force.
description.german: Rette deinen Freund vor einer unheimlichen Macht.
description.french: Sauvez votre ami d'une force sinistre.
description.italian: Salva il tuo amico da una forza minacciosa.
description.spanish: Salva a tu amigo de una fuerza siniestra.
description.japanese: 友達を邪悪な力から守ろう。

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as Sky, Bolo, and Rotty!
description.german: Erreiche 100% Beendung als Sky, Bolo und Rotty!
description.french: Atteignez 100 % d'achèvement avec Sky, Bolo et Rotty !
description.italian: Raggiungi il 100% di completamento come Sky, Bolo e Rotty!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue el 100% completado como Sky, Bolo y Rotty!
description.japanese: スカイ、ボロ、ロッティで完成率100％を達成しよう！

description.english: Obtain all win screens in Friends to the End.
description.german: Erhalte alle Gewinner-Bildschirme von Freunde bis zum Ende.
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire de la quête d'Amis pour la vie.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli schermi vincenti di Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria de Friends to the End.
description.japanese: 最後まで友達で勝利のスクリーンを全て入手。

description.english: Get crushed by a switch block.
description.french: Faites-vous écraser par un commutateur.
description.italian: Fatti schiacciare da un blocco interruttore.
description.spanish: Queda aplastada por un bloque cambiante.
description.japanese: スイッチブロックに潰されよう。

description.english: Complete a stage without using your sword.
description.german: Beende eine Stufe, ohne dein Schwert zu benutzen.
description.french: Terminez un niveau sans utiliser votre épée.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza usare la tua spada.
description.spanish: Completa una fase sin usar tu espada.
description.japanese: 剣を使わないでステージを1つクリアしよう。

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies with the Beach Ball.
description.french: Battez 20 ennemis avec le ballon de plage.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici con il Pallone da Spiaggia.
description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con la Pelota de Playa.
description.japanese: ビーチボールで敵を20体倒そう。

displayName.japanese: ビーチブランケット乱闘

description.english: Soak up the Scuttle Town sun in your swimwear.
description.german: Genieße die Sonne von Scuttle Town in deiner Badebekleidung.
description.french: Profitez du soleil de Scuttle Town dans votre maillot de bain.
description.italian: Prendi il sole nella città Scuttle indossando il tuo costume da bagno.
description.spanish: Absorbe el sol de Scuttle Town en tu bañador.
description.japanese: 水着姿でスカットルタウンの太陽を吸収しよう。

description.english: Conquer a fishy foe while dressed as a Ninja.
description.german: Erobere einen fischigen Gegner, während du als Ninja verkleidet bist.
description.french: Battez un ennemi louche en vous habillant en Ninja.
description.italian: Conquista un nemico marino vestito da ninja.
description.spanish: Conquista a un enemigo marino mientras vas de Ninja.
description.japanese: 忍者の衣装を身につけて怪しい敵を打ち破ろう。

description.english: Wipe someone's criminal record as an Officer of the Law.
description.german: Streiche die Vorstrafen von jemandem als Officer des Gesetzes.
description.french: Effacez le casier judiciaire de quelqu'un en tant qu'agent de la Loi.
description.italian: Elimina i precedenti penali di qualcuno come Ufficiale della Legge.
description.spanish: Limpia los antecedentes criminales de alguien como Agente de la Ley.
description.japanese: 警部として誰かの犯罪歴を抹消しよう。

description.english: Soar over Cape Crustacean in your swimwear.
description.german: Fliege über Cape Crustacean in deiner Badebekleidung.
description.french: Profitez du Cap crustacé dans votre maillot de bain.
description.italian: Vola sopra Cape Crustacean in costume da bagno.
description.spanish: Vuela sobre Cabo Crustáceo en bañador.
description.japanese: 水着姿でケープ・クラステーシャンの上空を飛行しよう。

description.english: Enforce curfew as an Officer of the Law.
description.german: Erzwinge die Ausgangssperre als Officer des Gesetzes.
description.french: Appliquez le couvre-feu en tant qu'agent de la Loi.
description.italian: Fai rispettare il coprifuoco come Ufficiale della Legge.
description.spanish: Vigila el toque de queda como Oficial de la Ley.
description.japanese: 警部として門限を守らせよう。

description.english: Defeat the Pirate Queen, Ninja style!
description.french: Battez la Reine Pirate, façon Ninja !
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Regina dei Pirati, in stile Ninja!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a la Reina Pirata al estilo Ninja!
description.japanese: 忍者スタイルで海賊女王を倒そう！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as an Officer!
description.french: Atteindre 100% d'achèvement en tant qu'officier!
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% di completamento come ufficiale!
description.spanish: ¡Lograr el 100% de finalización como oficial!
description.japanese: オフィサーとして100％達成！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as a Ninja!
description.french: Atteignez 100 % d'achèvement en tant que Ninja !
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% di completamento come un Ninja!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue el 100% completado como Ninja!
description.japanese: 忍者で完成率100％を達成しよう！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion in your bathing suit!
description.french: Atteignez 100 % d'achèvement dans votre maillot de bain !
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% di completamento indossando il tuo costume da bagno!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue el 100% completado en tu traje de baño!
description.japanese: 水着衣装で完成率100％を達成しよう！

description.english: Obtain all win screens while playing as Shantae in her Ninja, Beach, and Officer costumes!
description.german: Erhalten Sie alle gewinnenden Bildschirme, während Sie als Ninja, Strand und Offizier spielen!
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire en jouant en tant que Ninja, Beach et Agent!
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli schermi vincenti giocando a Ninja, Bath e Officer!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria como Shantae con sus trajes Ninja, de Playa y de Agente!
description.japanese: シャンティの忍者、浜辺、警部それぞれの衣装で勝利のスクリーンを全て入手しよう。

description.english: Land the final strike on any boss with only a sliver of your own health left.
description.german: Erledige einen Boss, wenn du nur ganz wenig deiner eigenen Gesundheit übrighast.
description.french: Portez le coup final à n'importe quel boss avec votre vie restante au minimum.
description.italian: Arriva al colpo finale contro ogni boss con solo un frammento di salute che ti rimane.
description.spanish: Lanza el ataque final contra cualquier jefe con solo un bloque de salud restante.
description.japanese: ボス一体に対してヘルスを一つだけ残しながら最後の一撃を与えよう。
